request_1: Your request will be added to the queue and will be processed as soon as possible. The waiting time may vary depending on the complexity of the request. Paid request price list: Regular pics (like on @gokuryo_art channel): • 5$ for 1 picture. • 15$ for a 4-picture pack. ! ! ! Regular pictures will be posted on the @gokuryo_art channel NSFW / Hentai pics (you can access the nsfw chat room after the purchase) • 7$ for 1 picture • 20$ for a 4 picture pack. ! ! !
